mapper.sql: a.id, title, person_id, topic, a.img, content, create_time, comment_num, b.nickname, b.img userImg, c.doc_name, c.img docImg
mapper.select: SELECT id, title, person_id, topic, img, content, create_time, comment_num FROM t_article where topic like CONCAT('%', #{0}, '%') order by create_time DESC
mapper.update: update t_article set comment_num=comment_num+1 where id=#{0}
mapper.delete: delete from t_article where id=#{id} AND person_id=#{personId}
